description: Manager agent that coordinates Knowledge Retrieval and Channel Response sub-agents to handle customer service inquiries end-to-end. Returns the final customer response, channel, topic category, urgency level, escalation status, and resolution status.

result.summary: No customer request or channel metadata was detected in the input. Unable to analyze or coordinate sub-agents without a specific inquiry.

data.customer_response: We did not receive a customer request or channel information. Please provide the exact customer message and specify the channel (chat, email, or social) so we can coordinate the appropriate support.
